titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income certain stipends paid as part of a State program under which individuals who have attained age 60 perform essentially volunteer services specified by the program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income certain stipends paid as part of a State program under which individuals 60 years or older perform qualifying volunteer services.
